src_original: te navopasaṃpannān vṛddhān satkurvani gurukurvanti mānayanti pūjayanti;  bhagavān āha:  anyonyaṃ varṣāgraṃ pṛṣṭvā vanditavyaṃ;  te pṛṣṭāḥ santo janmavarṣāṇi kathayanti;
tgt_original: 小苾芻等應禮大者，若初相見應問夏數及以受時。

src_original: bhagavān āha;  upasaṃpadvarṣāgraṃ praṣṭavyam iti;  bhikṣavo na jānate ḥkati varṣāgrāṇītiḥ; (MSV III 124)  bhagavān āha;  paṃceme bhikṣavaḥ samayāḥ,
haimantikaṃ graiṣmikaṃ vārṣikaṃ mṛtavārṣikaṃ dīrghavārṣikam iti;  tatra haimantikaṃ catvāro māsāḥ;  graiṣmikaṃ catvāro māsāḥ;
tgt_original: 一、謂冬時四月； 二、謂春時四月；

src_original: ḥvārṣikam eko māsaḥḥ;  mṛtavārṣikam ekaṃ rātrindivasam;  dīrghavārṣikaṃ rātryūnās trayo māsāḥ;  ity evaṃ sāmayikam ārocayitvā yaḥ pūrvopasaṃpannaḥ sa vanditavyaḥ
tgt_original: 三、謂雨時一月； 四、謂終時一日一夜； 五、謂長時三月少一日一夜。

src_original: apare bhikṣavaś catvāro vandyāḥ;  katame catvāro vandyāḥ?
tāval lokasya samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyā prajāyāḥ sadevamānuṣāyās tathāgatārhatsamyaksaṃbuddho vandyaḥ;
tgt_original: 一、是如來，一切人天並應致敬故。
